Name: भविष्यत् काल
Description: In grammar, a future tense is a verb form that generally marks the event described by the verb as not having happened yet, but expected to happen in the future.

Name: भूतकाल
Description: The past tense is a grammatical tense whose function is to place an action or situation in the past.

Name: भूतकाल सहायक
Description: An auxiliary verb  is used to express an action that is currently going on or habitually performed, or a state that currently or generally exists.

Name: वर्तमान
Description: A tense expressing an action that is currently going on or habitually performed, or a state that currently or generally exists.

Name: वर्तमान-सहायक
Description: An auxiliary verb है is used to express an action that is currently going on or habitually performed, or a state that currently or generally exists.
